channel.title: Stupid noob on runescape forums
channel.description:
I have something to say to jagex that may seem Ridiculous, but I plan on buying runescape to make it the way players want it! I will buy it for an impressive amount someday! The things I would do to runescape are listed below.
1)Bring Runescape Classic back 2)Add more security to runescape 2 3)Build new worlds 4)Make a world with less rules 5)KEEP YOU THERE! 6)Way More than that
If you read #5, that means keep all you there and under my company: Tealy. Please do not delete my thread, I will upgrade runescape to the MAX and beyond! I will make it so it can be better, safer and more fun for everyone!
Quoted from the rants forum.
